document.full_text: rim's playbook tablet has bombed with influential technology reviewers who call the new ipad competitor a rushed job that won't even provide rim's vaunted email service unless it's hooked up to a blackberry.
document.title: rim's email-less playbook gets tough reviews
lines_and_colors: rim's playbook tablet has bombed with influential technology reviewers who call the new ipad competitor a rushed job that won't even provide rim's vaunted email service unless it's hooked up to a blackberry.
